-        // if the file system can dynamically change size, this check will fail
-        if (ts != s.total()) {
+        // If the file system can dynamically change size, this check will fail.
+        // This can happen on macOS for the /dev files system.
+        if (ts != s.total() && (!Platform.isOSX() || !s.name().equals("/dev"))) {
